ComicInfo.Title: Rabid World #2
ComicInfo.Summary: Deep in the underground bioweapons base, a team of scientists desperately try to discover the origin of the virus ravaging the world. The hoards of infected cannot be contained and the cities have fallen. Meanwhile, the crew of the Jibberish embark a harrowing sail south to escape the Chesapeake Bay.
ComicInfo.Notes: Scraped metadata from Amazon [ASINB09YMWX16D], [RELDATE:2021-07-07] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 16:35:46. [Issue ID 2270882]
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: DrVink. Library loans through OverDrive and Kindle; ripped with Calibre DeDRM. Library loans through Hoopla, plus other sources; webrip. Denoised and upscaled with waifu2x-caffe or other tools.
